name: One Darling Harbour

reviews.title: Loved Grand Mercure Apartments
reviews.text: Would certainly recommend these Apartments to stay. Great family place, fantastic location, really good size room with quality furnishings and fittings.All the Staff were really friendly and helpful in organising tours etc. Just walk outside and hop on Monorail which is terrific.Children loved the roof top pool and spa. Would certainly stay there again and have already given verbal reference to friends who are going to Sydney for week-ends.

reviews.title: WOW
reviews.text: Unbeatable views from the huge private balcony, enough spac inside to host a party, trendy decor with marble kitchen and bathrooms, the most comfortable bed I've ever slept on, fantastic central location, great pool, spa and gym, and has every convenience you'd expect from a top hotel. Couldn't be improved if they tried! If you're a tourist looking for a place to relax looking over the most beautiful part of Sydney, or a local couple looking for a romantic getaway, go the Mercure!

We spent a week in a 2 bedroomed apartment in May. We had excellent views over Darling Harbour. The standard of the apartment and the accommodation was excellent. The kitchen was the best equipped rented kitchen we had ever experienced. The staff were very helpful and the parking facilities and security was very good. The pool, spa and gym were good too with great views over Sydney. Good value for money, we would definitely stay there again. PS London
reviews.title: Location, location, location!

description: Grand Mercure Apartments One Darling Harbour offer a range of fully serviced two and three bedroom executive apartments with a balcony and views of the city skyline or western Sydney. The apartments are surrounded by Sydney's premier visitor attractions,including the Sydney Aquarium, Maritime Museum, IMAX Theatre, Powerhouse Museum, Sydney Convention Centre and Casino. Features include a 25 metre indoor lap pool, gym, sauna and spa.
